reviews.review_msg: Her lectures are very easy to follow and pretty engaging. The exams are very straightforward as long as you understand the main concepts from the chapters/lectures. There are various quizzes throughout the semester that are online and open-book to make sure you do the reading. I would take another class with Dr. Butler and recommend her classes!

Amanda was a very good professor for a first year course. Her lectures were straight forward and kept the students engaged, as the slides were open-ended and required additional notes. The tests were a difficult at times, but the online component of the course provided easy marks.
Very good at teaching and is very clear. Exams are pretty easy as long as you read the textbook!

Amanda is an awesome professor in the sense that she is very approachable and helps students with enthusiasm. Take advantage of this and ask for help if you need it, she gives clear interactions and you can even get her to clarify exam questions during the exam. The grade breakdown is great, bc if you can still do well if u mess up on 1 component.
For a first year university class, Amanda was a pretty good prof. However, be warned about her exams. Her exams can be a little tough with the short answers and essay questions.

Amanda was very nice and approachable however, her lectures were pointless as they were directly from the textbook. She needed to provide her opinion, examples, and just generally interest students in the topic instead of reading fast through the slides. Her online tutorials were pointless and it had too many assignments. Her tests were fair.
